## Documentation Task

### Description
Brief description of what documentation needs to be created or updated.

### Type
- [ ] New documentation
- [ ] Update existing documentation
- [ ] Documentation review
- [ ] Examples/code snippets

### Related Documentation
Link to related files or issues:
-

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document is complete and well-structured
- [ ] Includes concrete examples
- [ ] Cross-references to related documents
- [ ] Follows markdown style guide
- [ ] Reviewed and approved
- [ ] LLM-consumable format

### File(s) to Create/Update
- `docs/path/to/document.md`

### Phase
- [ ] Phase 0 - Foundation
- [ ] Phase 1 - API Reference & Standards
- [ ] Phase 2 - Tier 1 Platform Docs
- [ ] Phase 4 - Tier 2 Platform Docs
